item.description:
Hello MLUSA members,

Come join the Boston Mycological Club on Sunday for an autumn walk through beautiful Ravenswood Park in Gloucester. A 600 acre park with 10 miles of trails, with an overlook of Gloucester Harbor, and a board walk through a Â Magnolia swamp. Parking in the lot is limited,but parking is allowed all along the road. After labor day, the BMC walks begin at 1:30 pm, so please note the change from our normal 10:30 am starting time. Feel free to contact me with any questions. Hope to see you there.

Jean Saunders
item.name: BMC Mushroom Hunt at Ravenswood Park in Gloucester
